title: DOM removal from Lake Kinneret by adsorption columns and biodegradation: a pilot study and modeling
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00407H, Paper
Mario Leonardo Kummel, Ofri Baruch Zusman, Shlomo Nir, Yael Golda Mishael
The removal throughout a year of dissolved organic matter (DOM) from Lake Kinneret water, the main reservoir of surface drinking water in Israel, was studied by adsorption pilot plant columns...
